name: Unscannable File
description: Unscannable file events report files that could not be scanned and the reasons why.

file.description: The file that could not be scanned.

scan_name.description:
The name of the scan - an administrator-supplied name or an application-generated summary of the scan task. For example:
  • Home office weekly user database scan
  • Scan folders for viruses
  • Full system virus scan

Recommended maximum length of 256.

scan_uid.description: The application-generated unique identifier that is used to associate detection events with this SCAN event.
